name: Candy Craze
description:
This is a small game made in 72 hours for the 66th Mini Game Jam. The theme was "Sweets" and the limitation was that you can only have 2 buttons in the entire game. Including menus, and controls.  I didn't get as much time as I had expected when I started the jam, but I am definitely happy with the result.

In the game, you must dodge obstacles by flipping gravity. There is no jump.  Enjoy!

The controls: 

Space to flip gravity. 

"M" to go to the Menu
